text: Cristo Rey Fort Worth College Prep is a Roman Catholic high school in Fort Worth, Texas. It is a part of the Cristo Rey Network and is under the Roman Catholic Diocese of Fort Worth. It is in the Terrell Heights Historic District in the former Our Mother of Mercy Catholic School. Students attending work jobs part-time to pay for tuition. It opened in 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Cristo Rey Fort Worth College Prep Category:2018 establishments in Texas Category:Educational institutions established in 2018 Category:High schools in Fort Worth, Texas Category:Catholic secondary schools in Texas
title: Cristo Rey Fort Worth College Prep
